thread.title: O’Reilly Apologizes After Making ‘Dumb’ Comment About Democratic Lawmaker’s Appearance
thread.title_full: O’Reilly Apologizes After Making ‘Dumb’ Comment About Democratic Lawmaker’s Appearance

author: B. Christopher Agee
title: O’Reilly Apologizes After Making ‘Dumb’ Comment About Democratic Lawmaker’s Appearance
text:
Sanctuary City Mayors Fire Back After Sessions Tells Them To Obey The Law 
He went on to assert Waters was wearing “the same wig” as the late soul singer. 
While co-host Brian Kilmeade initially went along with O’Reilly’s assessment, Ainsley Earhart chimed in to take the congresswoman’s side.   
“I have to defend her on that,” she told O’Reilly.Â “You can’t go after a woman’s looks. I think she’s very attractive.” 
O’Reilly clarified he “didn’t say [Waters] wasn’t attractive,” using the opportunity to build on his original comparison. 
“I love James Brown,” he said. “But it’s the same hair James Brown — alright, the ‘Godfather of Soul’— had.” 
The joke was met with mixed reviews on Twitter, where several critics suggested it was evidence of O’Reilly’s racism.
